Vinyasa Yoga
12:30pm-01:30pm
£ 10

Join me for this freeeeee meditation class to Support the Totton Pet Food Bank.

This class is free, but please bring pet food to donate. Chews and treats are very welcome for cat, dog, kitten, puppy . Opened dry food is also fine, or decanted, so long as it is sealed and dated with the use-by date.

This is a charity very close to my heart and I appreciate your support. Enjoy a meditation practice with me and do good!
